original_title: 大唐英豪之曼陀罗之谜
overview: A sequel to "The Hero of Tang Dynasty: Autumn Water In The Desert"; In 867 AD (Tang. Xiantong era), a major event occurs in Xichuan, Jiedu which leads to the assassination of Chen Lei to be assassinated. The murderer is suspected to be "the world's number one swordsman" Pei Yu. With the capital shook, Luo Chonglou and Jin Shengnan go to Xichuan to investigate secretly, and discover a terrifying conspiracy to overthrow the Tang Dynasty.
title: The Hero of Tang Dynasty: the Mystery of the Mandala
